cleaned_text: Courses Balance protocol prime Balance Protocol PRIME course provides a complete walkthrough and training of all the principles, tenets and methods of Balance Protocol as well as sets the foundation for all other programs. Balance protocol ENVIRO Balance Protocol ENVIRO 2.0 covers the first of eight keys of Balance Protocol to empower you with all the strategies and methods to optimize your environment. These environmental inputs include AIR, WATER, LIGHT, SOUND, EMF & FOOD. Consults This program includes a simple at home lab that will identify the underlying balances in your health. It also includes a consultation with an individualized diet, based on your specific data, with a Balance Protocol Certified Practitioner
